entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 01:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -27.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
